title: Tax hike could fight inflationary gap

content.question: An inflationary gap could be reduced by

choices.label: an increase in the supply of money
an increase in the income tax rate
a decrease in the discount rate
a decrease in the reserve requirement

content.answer: an increase in the income tax rate

skill.text: Skill 2.A: Using economic concepts, principles, or models, explain how a specific economic outcome occurs, or what action should be taken in order to achieve a specific economic outcome.
